column4: I have Feisty and want to install Gutsy over it. Backing up my /home will work totally?
you can upgrade witht he CD too
upgrade from cd? it's a new feature of gutsy don't?
no it's not a new feature. it always wa there. always
that's funny because I never have noticed it tough desiring it so much. It happens when analysing the partitions right?
you do not boot from the CD ever when upgrading
you ad the CD to your sources.list and do a apt-get update; apt-get dist-upgrade. that's all
and that's supposed to tell me what?
if you want a backup, make a tarfile of what you want ot backup. you can put this easily on a ntfs drive without any problems
have a nice day and learn to speak properly. good bye
have some sex, you need it I guess
